description: Full-Stack JavaScript with MongoDB, Express, AngularJS, and Node.js
mission: Foodbank Template is a volunteer run organization based in <Location> with the mission of helping families who are in need. We provide weekly non-perishable and freshly baked goods, to ensure that every Jewish family has delicious meals. The organization was founded in <Year> in memory of <Founder>, who was very kind and sensitive to the needs of others.
